title: I'm a Celebrity 2019: News on Line-up, Trials and Winners
text:
I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here! informally known as I'm A Celebrity or I'm A Celeb is a British reality TV show that puts a line-up of celebrities in an Australian jungle camp.

The celebrities must live in jungle conditions and complete trials in a bid to win meals and votes from the viewers to be crowned king or queen of the jungle at the end of the series. Ant and Dec have been hosting since the first series in 2002, however in August 2018 it was confirmed Holly Willoughby would be replacing Ant McPartlin.
description: Find out the latest I'm A Celebrity 2019 news on the line-up including Harry Redknapp and John Barrowman plus more on the ITV show's Bushtucker Trials.
